about.title: About
about.description: I am a Full Stack Developer with over 5 years of experience in web development. I am passionate about creating modern, efficient, and user-friendly web applications.
about.careerObjectiveText: My name is Thieu Sy Tung, and I am 29 years old. I have 5 years of experience in PHP development, and I aspire to apply my knowledge to become a professional PHP developer. My goal is to create high-quality products that generate greater value for the company and contribute to my personal growth.
about.name: Full Name
about.locationValue: Go Vap District, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
about.careerGoalsDescription: As a dedicated developer, I aim to continuously grow and contribute to the tech community. Here are my key career objectives:
about.careerGoal1: Become a Technical Lead and mentor junior developers
about.careerGoal2: Master advanced technologies and contribute to open-source projects
about.careerGoal3: Build innovative solutions that make a positive impact

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.description1: Leading the development of enterprise applications using React and Node.js
experience.description2: Developing and maintaining multiple client projects
experience.responsibility1: Design and develop scalable web applications
experience.responsibility2: Mentor junior developers and review code
experience.responsibility4: Build responsive web applications using Vue.js and Laravel
experience.responsibility5: Optimize database queries and improve application performance
experience.responsibility6: Collaborate with designers to improve UI/UX

education.title: Education
education.subtitle: My Learning Journey
education.description1: Major in Software Engineering. Graduated with Distinction, GPA 8.5/10. Participated in various scientific research projects and programming competitions.
education.description2: Major in Artificial Intelligence. Research focus on Machine Learning and Deep Learning. Thesis on AI applications in big data analysis.
education.achievement1: First Prize in University Programming Competition
education.achievement2: Full Scholarship for 4 years of study
education.achievement3: Participated and won prizes in hackathon competitions
education.achievement5: Published scientific paper on Machine Learning
education.achievement6: Participated and won prizes in AI Challenge

education1.description: Major in Software Engineering. Graduated with Distinction, GPA 8.5/10. Participated in various scientific research projects and programming competitions.

education2.description: Major in Artificial Intelligence. Research focus on Machine Learning and Deep Learning. Thesis on AI applications in big data analysis.

project1.title: E-commerce Platform
project1.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with payment processing, order management, and data analytics.

project2.title: Task Management System
project2.description: A comprehensive task management system with features for task assignment, progress tracking, and reporting.

project3.title: Social Media Dashboard
project3.description: A social media management dashboard with analytics, post scheduling, and engagement tracking features.
